constraint.SQL: ["EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TIB_XMXX_XSB T WHERE T.XMMC=tIB_XMXX.ID AND T.KPJD<>112)",[]]

column.name: BMZKZY2
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var BMZKZY= ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT BMZKZY FROM ECIF.TIB_XMXX where id=?",[O_MASTER.XMMC]);
if(BMZKZY==null){
   var count=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT count(1) FROM jgcrm.lborganization t1 where t1.id=?  start with t1.id=10016 connect by prior t1.id= t1.fid",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
    if (count==0){
        BMZKZY=ABS_SQLVALUE("select ZKZY from ecif.tIB_ZKZYWH where YWBM=?",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
   }
}
BMZKZY;
column.comment: <font color=red size=2>部门质控专员由非债务融资总部发起时填写<font>

column.name: TDZKZY
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var TDZK=ABS_SQLVALUE("select TDZKZY from ECIF.tIB_XMXX_GS where id=?",[O_MASTER.ID]);
if(TDZK==null||''||0){
   var count=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT count(1) FROM jgcrm.lborganization t1 where t1.id=?  start with t1.id=10016 connect by prior t1.id= t1.fid",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
   if(count>0){
    TDZK=ABS_SQLVALUE("select TDZKZY from ECIF.tIB_GDSYZBRYJG where type=4 start with yg=? connect by prior fid=id",[$Login.User]);
   }
   }
TDZK;
column.comment: <font color=red size=2>团队质控专员由债务融资总部发起时填写<font>

column.name: GSSHG
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var GSSH=ABS_SQLVALUE("select GSSHG from ECIF.tIB_XMXX_GS where id=?",[O_MASTER.ID]);
if(GSSH==null||''||0){
    var count=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT count(1) FROM jgcrm.lborganization t1 where t1.id=?  start with t1.id=10016 connect by prior t1.id= t1.fid",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
    if(count>=1){
         GSSH=ABS_SQLVALUE("select ZHBSHG from ECIF.tIB_GDSYZBRYJG where type=4 start with yg=? connect by prior fid=id",[$Login.User]);
    }
}
GSSH;
